ðŸ“– Summary: HeadlessX is a self-hosted headless browser automation platform designed as an alternative to Browserless. It focuses on speed, privacy, and scalability, offering advanced anti-detection capabilities and human-like behavioral simulation for web scraping and automation tasks. Version 1.3.0 includes features like canvas fingerprinting control, WebGL spoofing, and Bezier mouse movement.
